Articles.Content:
> 
> What is the Hypetrain speed?

It was running at 64mph, but it has just slowed down to 32mph for some reason ^^
I think maybe mach 1.5 is the best guess.
I wonder how long it'll take before the people who use the 64 bit client start complaining and/or SQUAD realizes what happened with the 64bit client part.....
Yep, just had the 0kb update here too.
What does opting into the betas and selecting previous stable version do? I accidentially started it, but was able to cancel it before it actually did anything.
Anyways we are in experimentals now according to steamDB. I think last week was just *preparing* for experimentals.

> 
> Anyways we are in experimentals now according to steamDB. I think last week was just *preparing* for experimentals.

I thought experimentals started last thursday when they said that they were going into experimentals phase?

I'm a bit surprised that the windows 64-bit client lovers (despite being buggy to all heck) crowd hasn't started posting angrily/frustrationly already.

> I'm a bit surprised that the windows 64-bit client lovers (despite being buggy to all heck) crowd hasn't started posting angrily/frustrationly already.

That's because anyone who has enough mods installed to warrant needing 64-bit has already discovered that 64-bit can't handle even just the stock game. XD

> 
> That's because anyone who has enough mods installed to warrant needing 64-bit has already discovered that 64-bit can't handle even just the stock game. XD

Theres going to be some holdouts though.
What is the Hypetrain speed in PPM? (Posts Per Minute)?
In cruise mode I think?

![CB37lrOUsAAoQ7o.jpg:large](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CB37lrOUsAAoQ7o.jpg:large)

Twitter: @KSA\_MissionCtrl has experimentals access. (Kenbob please add this to the Original Post under the other two pictures of Valentina Kerman)

Looks like we're back in scratchpad. All three depots have had scratchpad updated.

Edit:

![eGL3UPz.png](http://i.imgur.com/eGL3UPz.png)

> Twitter: @KSA\_MissionCtrl has experimentals access. (Kenbob please add this to the Original Post under the other two pictures of Valentina Kerman)

Val has a hair bun?!?!

Its the same ridge visible in the helmets now....

[![screenshot55_zpshj6lfvcl.png](http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v214/smjjames/screenshot55_zpshj6lfvcl.png)](http://smg.photobucket.com/user/smjjames/media/screenshot55_zpshj6lfvcl.png.html)

> 
> Val has a hair bun?!?!

A ponytail, I believe.

> 
> It was running at 64mph, but it has just slowed down to 32mph for some reason ^^

No, we sped up by 32 kilometers/seconds

> 
> No, we sped up by 32 kilometers/seconds

96 kilometers/second? Can the ol' Hypetrain handle such a speed?

> 
> 96 kilometers/second? Can the ol' Hypetrain handle such a speed?

Mmmm, Hypersonic flight is not good for trains.

![3839f74aafcaf4c3c5948c5bf5ca356bb6be4c69.jpg](http://www.bbc.co.uk/staticarchive/3839f74aafcaf4c3c5948c5bf5ca356bb6be4c69.jpg)

A nosecone like this would be good.

I think the update is tomorrow. steam just updated ksp!

by 0 mb.

> 
> I think the update is tomorrow. steam just updated ksp!
> by 0 mb.

No, that was just squad stealing your 64 bit.

> 
> Val has a hair bun?!?!

Yep. You can see the tie she uses in the original introductory picture even...

> 
> Its the same ridge visible in the helmets now....
> http://smg.photobucket.com/user/smjjames/media/screenshot55_zpshj6lfvcl.png.html[http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v214/smjjames/screenshot55_zpshj6lfvcl.png](http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v214/smjjames/screenshot55_zpshj6lfvcl.png)

lol. I hadn't noticed that I guess. The shape of Val's head makes it more obvious.
